Create.ArtistDesc: 노래와 연관된 프로듀서, 가수 및 보컬로이드
Create.ArtistHelp: If the artist cannot be found it probably hasn't been added yet. Check other possible spellings of that artist's name, and if you're confident there's no entry yet, please create one using the "Add an artist" menu. You can do this after the song has already been created. You can't create the artist on this page.
Create.DuplicatePV: It seems this PV has already been added to the database.
Create.Name: Name (need at least one)
Create.NameHelp: If the entry has a non-English (for example Japanese) name, or if the language of the name is unknown, input that into the Non-English name field. If known, input the romanized name as well. If the official name of the entry is in English, or the there is a known English translation, input that into the English name field.
Create.NoArtistsToName: Do not enter artist names into the name field. Instead, use the artists list.
Create.OriginalPV: URL to the original PV (such as NicoNico or YouTube)
Create.OriginalSuggestionsTitle: Is any of these the original version?
Create.ReprintPV: URL to the reprint of the PV (such as NicoNico or YouTube)
Create.SubmitSong: Add a new song to the database
Create.UnableToCreateSong: Unable to create song. Please correct the errors and try again.

Details.SuggestionsTitle: Users who liked this also liked

Edit.ArArtistsNote: Note that you can tag artists for a song much faster after tagging the album first.
Edit.ArVocaloidsNote: Vocaloids, UTAUs and other singing synthesizer voicebanks are added as artists as well.
Edit.BaNames: Primary name (in one or more languages)
Edit.BaOriginalVersionHelp: If the original version of this song exists on the site, use this field to link this derived version to the original. Choose the song by searching by song title.
Edit.BaPublishDateHelp: Date when this song was first published (either on an album or online)
Edit.LyInheritanceNote: Lyrics are by default inherited from the original version. They do not need to be specified for the derived versions unless they are different.
Edit.PvInstrumentalNote: Note that instrumental versions are to be added in external links instead of media.
Edit.PvStatusHelp: If the PV is deleted or hidden by the author and thus unplayable, it should be marked as "Unavailable" here.
Edit.PvSupportedServices: Supported services: YouTube, NicoNico, Vimeo, SoundCloud, Piapro, Bilibili, Creofuga and Bandcamp (tracks only).

Rankings.FilterCreateDateDescription: Songs that were added to VocaDB recently
Rankings.FilterPopularityDescription: Songs that have been popular recently
